attributes.action: Once the EU leave talks are over give us a vote to accept or leave with no deal.
attributes.additional_details: Reading the daily updates on the progress of leaving the EU, it is becoming more and more concerning at how much money is going to be offered and what that is actually for. I am proposing that once the talks are complete and a leaving deal is set on the table, a democratic vote is given to the people to decide if this is accepted or if we walk away and accept no deal.
attributes.background: Teresa May is currently negotiating our country leaving the EU. The democratic majority opted to leave due to control of our laws, borders and our own trade agreements. I propose that once the talks are complete the people are given the decision to accept the offer or walk away with no deal and bill
